mapper.select: select * from ScglXD where (id=(select MAX(id) from ScglXD))
select * from ScglXD where (date >=#{date1} and date <= #{date2})
mapper.insert: insert into ScglXD( targetCapacity, actualCapacity, targetEfficiency, workingHours, beat) values(#{targetCapacity},#{actualCapacity},#{targetEfficiency},#{workingHours},#{beat})
mapper.update: update ScglXD set ( targetCapacity=#{ targetCapacity}, actualCapacity=#{actualCapacity}, targetEfficiency=#{targetEfficiency}, workingHours=#{ workingHours}, beat=#{beat}, date=#{date}) where date=#{date}
